channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Enterprise Manager Ops Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Enterprise Manager Ops Center

item.title: CVE-2018-2976|2024-08-05T04:36:39.513Z -- oracle%20corporation -- enterprise%20manager%20ops%20center
item.description: Vulnerability in the Enterprise Manager Ops Center component of Oracle Enterprise Manager Products Suite (subcomponent: Networking). The supported version that is affected is 12.2.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Enterprise Manager Ops Center. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Enterprise Manager Ops Center accessible data as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Enterprise Manager Ops Center accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.2 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:L/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2018-2742|2024-08-05T04:29:44.666Z -- oracle%20corporation -- enterprise%20manager%20ops%20center
item.description: Vulnerability in the Enterprise Manager Ops Center component of Oracle Enterprise Manager Products Suite (subcomponent: Framework). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.2 and 12.3.3. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Enterprise Manager Ops Center. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Enterprise Manager Ops Center accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Enterprise Manager Ops Center accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Enterprise Manager Ops Center. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.3 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L).
